title: Mind helping me, by giving some ideas? :)
body: Hello to anyone who is reading this, I play on the EUW region but i have an account on NA  with 1380 rp i want o bring my NA account to the EUW region anyway possible, I have contacted league support transitions many times, ( I want to get the championship zed skin) anyone can help, any way i could bring that account to EUW other than buying because i cant, I need USD Anyone got ideas? :/

replies.body:
Unfortunately, your only option is to purchase a Region transfer. The rare times when we've offered Region transfers in the past for free have been for deployments of new Regional servers. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
